text: Four Weddings and a Funeral is a 1994 British romantic comedy-drama movie. It was written and co-produced by Richard Curtis. It was directed by Mike Newell. It stars Hugh Grant as Charles and Andie MacDowell as Carrie, an American whom he repeatedly meets at weddings and a funeral as they become attracted to each other. == Other websites == * Category:1994 comedy-drama movies Category:1994 LGBT movies Category:1994 romantic comedy movies Category:1994 romantic drama movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:British LGBT movies Category:British romantic comedy movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:LGBT comedy-drama movies Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in Scotland Category:Movies directed by Mike Newell
title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
